p: Zhang group reported that the use of 1-cyanopropyl-3-methylimidazolium bis(trifluoromethanesulfonyl)imide, [cpmim][NTf 2], as additive in electrolyte for high-voltage lithium-ion batteries (LIBs), sharply increasing the discharge capability of these batteries [ 45]. Cyclic voltammograms of the LiNi 0.5Mn 1.5O 4/Li system are presented in Figure 9, displaying two redox peaks on each curve.
